But perhaps most importantly, this field of research will allow the development of proper field engineering equipment and improved logistics and command systems. This field is vital  if you want good infantry, paras and marines.

戦術機から強襲揚陸機や重火力機などの特別機体の開発も行います。
また、戦術機用装備の改善も行います。
戦術機はあらゆる戦いの主力となるので、積極的に技術を上げていくと良いでしょう。
French: This field of research allows a nation to develop heavy weapons and materials for its units. It includes cannon and special vehicles allowing the construction of Artillery and Rocket Artillery units. But perhaps most importantly, this field of research will allow the development of tanks and early armored personnel carriers with the speed, protection and firepower to break through enemy lines. This is field is vital if you want good tank divisions and artillery brigades.

English: 航空機設計
航空機の設計を行います。\n都市を壊滅させる戦略爆撃機や敵の部隊を撃破する戦術爆撃機など、今次大戦は航空機の時代でもあります。
French: This field of research allows a nation to develop weapons and materials for its air force. It includes cannon, engines and aircraft fuselage allowing the construction of fighters and bomber units. This field is vital if you want good aircraft and air superiority is important if you are to win the war.

English: 艦艇設計
軍艦の設計を行います。\n巨大な戦艦や空母、小型の駆逐艦や潜水艦の研究開発をします。\n海に面する国家ならば制海権を握るために海軍力の強化は必須です。
French: This field of research allows a nation to develop a naval power projection capability. If your war effort relies either upon defeating the enemy by projecting your own power over the sea, or by denying the enemy the ability to project his own power, this field is vital. Research will allow a nation to build large capital ships, such as Battleships and Aircraft Carriers, and smaller warships, like Destroyers and Submarines.

English: 工業関連

国家の産業やインフラの技術開発をします。
人材のより効率的な利用、生産能力の強化は国家の基礎体力を上げることにつながります。
コンピュータと原子力の研究もここで行います。
コンピュータは高度な研究に必要な計算処理の速度を改善するでしょう。
French: This field of research allows a nation to develop its industry and infrastructure. It includes more efficient use of manpower allowing the ever increasing output of combat formations. But perhaps most importantly, this field of research will allow the general increase of industrial capacity. Also interesting are the development of computers and nuclear power. The first will improve the speed of the complex calculations needed for advanced research such as the development of atomic weapons.

English: 秘密兵器
秘密兵器は大戦間期型の末に生み出された実験兵器を指します。\n勝利を決定づけることもあれば、莫大な資源を浪費する可能性もあります。\n秘密兵器は大戦の趨勢を変化させるターニングポイントとなるかもしれません。
French: Secret Weapons are the result of desperation or the industrious testing of speculative novelties. Sometimes they became decisive instruments of victory and sometimes black holes of resource waste. To start researching a technology in this field, you must already have mastered every technology in an ordinary field. Secret weapons might change the war and might even be the turning point you were looking for.

English: 陸軍ドクトリン
陸軍の戦術や軍団編成を改善する理論を研究します。\nこれによって戦闘時のボーナスが発生したり組織率が上ったりします。\n国家ごとに研究を進める体系が異なるので気をつけて下さい。
French: These land doctrines were introduced sometimes by directives based on theoretical knowledge and sometimes by a trial and error process. They cover the tactical, organizational and strategic aspects of land combat. There are alternatives  representing different cultural outlooks but also need. A focus on Mobility allows a choice between the blitzkrieg used by the German Wehrmacht and the mass-combat assaults used by the Red Army. A focus on Firepower allows a choice between the offensive fire and movement favoured by the US Army and a more defensive doctrine based upon WWI fighting. The latter provides three different versions of firepower doctrine used by the British, the French and the Japanese.

English: 航空ドクトリン
航空機の戦術や軍団編成を改善する理論を研究します。\nこれにより戦闘時のボーナスが発生したり組織率が上ったりします。\n国家ごとに研究を進める体系が異なるので気をつけて下さい。
French: These air doctrines were introduced sometimes by directives based on theoretical knowledge and sometimes by trial and error process. They all cover the tactical, organizational and strategic aspects of air combat. There are modular branches representing different areas of the air war. The Battlefield Destruction is efficient close air support, Operational Destruction is efficient tactical bombing capability and Strategic Destruction is efficient strategic bombing capability. The first two doctrines also provide Offensive Fighter capability while the latter two give Defensive Fighter capability.

English: 海軍ドクトリン

French: These naval doctrines were introduced sometimes by directives based on theoretical knowledge and sometimes by a trial and error process. They cover the tactical, organizational and strategic aspects of naval combat. There are three main choices of doctrine.  Base Strike doctrine results in an offensive navy with excellent carrier capability. Fleet-in-Being doctrine gives the ability to protect and defend sealanes, and results in a strong surface-combat navy. Sealane Interdiction doctrine gives an excellent ability to destroy enemy convoys using submarines and surface-combat commerce raiders.
